title: Creating Lattice Structures With AdaCAD
description: In this tutorial, we are taking inspiration from one of Elizabeth Meiklejohn's samples from the 2023 Experimental Weaving Residency. In this sample, four layers are interlocking to create a lattice structure. Elastic foats are placed between the layers to pull the ends together (puffing up the structure), allowing you to pull out the sides to collapse the structure.
